name: Sly Spy
description: Sly Spy, known in Japan as Secret Agent (シークレット・エージェント) and known in Europe as Sly Spy: Secret Agent, is an arcade game developed and published by Data East in 1989. After Data East became defunct due to their bankruptcy back in 2003, G-Mode bought the intellectual rights to the arcade game as well as most other Data East games and licenses globally.
